name: The Little Bomb
description:
>> INTRODUCTION <<

In this game you are a BOMB and you need to explode your enemies before they put out your fire, collect points, upgrade yourself and became a master bomb.

This is a ENDLESS GAME , survive as long as YOU CAN!!!

>> CONTROLS <<

  1. ARROWS/WASD  - MOVE
  2. SPACE -  EXPLODE
  3. E - MENU SHOP/PAUSE

>> *GAME MADE TO Mini Jam 32: Explosions <<

*MEMBERS

  • Rafael Nillo (Programmer)
  • Paola Musmicker (Artist)
  • Wendell Franco (Sound Designer/Programmer)
